result.arabic_text: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ
result.translation: Icemezo cereka ababangikanyamana ko Imana Allah Ishoboye kuzura abapfuye, ni isi yagadutse igacika ubukumbagare, aho Twebwe Allah, Dutuma hagwa imvura ivuye mu bicu izananye mu kirere, Tugaheza Tukayitotahaza, maze Tukayinagishako n’ibiterwa mbumbarugo vy’ubwoko butandukanye, hakoreshejwe amazi ya nya mvura, abantu bagaheza bakabifungurako, bo hamwe n’ibitungwa vyabo;
